title: Robert Kaufman Kaufman Down On The Farm Digital Panel Country
features: Designed by Kathleen Parr McKenna for Robert Kaufman this cotton print panel is 24'' and features a farm-inspired print and is perfect for quilting apparel and home decor accents. Colors include beige white orange green red blue purple and pink.
Washing Instructions: Machine Wash/Tumble Dry Low
